recipe.title: Chocolate Chip Skillet Cookie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 8 oz ; chocolate, broken up into chunks ; (225 g)

steps.step: Press ⅔ of the cookie dough into the bottom and up the sides of a small skillet or a small cake pan.
Place the chocolate chunks in the middle of the cookie dough, then place the other flattened ⅓ of the cookie dough on top.
Crimp the edges of the dough together to seal in the chocolate.
Serve warm with ice cream and caramel sauce.

Place the chocolate chunks in the middle of the cookie dough, then place the other flattened ⅓ of the cookie dough on top.
